page.title: 13POPULATION IN PEATLING MAGNA
page.content:
{POPULATION ALTOGETHER IN PEATLING MAGNA THERE ARE 133 PEOPLE OVER THE AGE OF 18. WE FOUND THIS OUT BY LOOKING BACK AT THE ELECTORAL ROLL WHICH TELLS US THE NAMES AND ADRESSES OF PEOPLE WHO ARE ALLOWED TO VOTE.
IN 1863 THE POPULATION OF PEATLING MAGNA WAS 272 PEOPLE, IN 1877 IT DECREASED BY 44 PEOPLE TO 228.
WE THINK THE POPULATION HAS DROPPED BECAUSE LESS PEOPLE WORK IN PEATLING MAGNA AS THE FARMERS NO LONGER NEED SO MANY WORKERS AS THEY HAVE MANY MACHINES NOW. ALSO MANY PEOPLE HAVE MOVED OUT TO FIND BETTER JOBS IN BIGGER TOWNS.
